title: Basic Bank System Website
description: A web application to manage customer transactions and balance statements.
points: Allows users to view customer details and balances.

title: Blood Donor Website
description: A platform for connecting blood donors with recipients in need.
points: Allows users to register as donors or search for donors.
Provides a location-based search for donors.
Ensures secure data storage and privacy for users.

title: Milestone Tracker Tool
description: A project management tool to track milestones and progress.
points: Allows users to create and manage project milestones.

title: Own Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills.
points: Highlights skills, projects, and professional achievements.
Responsive design optimized for various devices.
Integrated with GitHub and LinkedIn for connectivity.
